title: BetterFPS
readme:
![header image](https://i.imgur.com/GIsMH5y.jpg)
##How to use it?
To open the menu press F7
##How does it works?
 * Disable Water Rendering - Simply disable the water rendering so the water will be transparent. (+20FPS on my PC)
 * Disable Raft Collisions - Disable the raft collisions, This will save a lot of performance but your raft will not collide anymore with islands. (+35FPS on my bigger raft.)
 * Disable Block Breaking Lag - When destroying a block it won't check if all the raft blocks are stable. (-5seconds of freezing on my PC)
 * Enable Poopy Quality - This will fully shittify the game. It will be worse than minecraft. (+95fps on my pc (From EXTREME to this))
## Screenshots
![image of the menu](https://i.imgur.com/opdmCq3.jpg)

![image of the reduced graphics quality](https://i.imgur.com/Pbov6Ak.jpg)
## Download
[BetterFPS.dll](https://www.raftmodding.com/TeKGameRMods/BetterFPS.dll)
author: TeKGameR950

title: Item Spawner
description: Spawn any items/objects with a sexy UI
readme:
![](https://i.imgur.com/vIGFNnd.jpg)
## How to use it?
 * To open the menu press F8
 * To give yourself an item, click on a item and click GIVE.
 * You can press the + and - button to change the amount to give, you can also edit the amount as its a textfield.
## Screenshots?
![](https://i.imgur.com/1KYfArc.png)

![](https://i.imgur.com/aLHj8Da.png)
## Download
[ItemSpawner.dll](https://www.raftmodding.com/forum/download/file.php?id=118)
author: TeKGameR950

title: SimpleWeatherChange
description: It allows you to change the weather...
readme:
There is not much to say about this one, other than it probably being smallest mod possible. It allows you to change the weather...
## How to use:
1. install mod
2. type 'nextWeather' in console to switch to the next weather condition
   type 'prevWeather' in console to switch to the previouse weather condition
   type 'toggleWeatherCycle' to freeze/unfreeze the weather to the current condition
## Download
Version 1.6: [SimpleWeatherChange.dll V1.6](https://redirect.viglink.com/?format=go&jsonp=vglnk_154980290764914&key=e4fd14f5d7f2bb6d80b8f8da1354718c&libId=jrywj0960102ktoa000DA1h8e2j87&subId=62deeee71f60a5059fc1f4c57d8cf4ea&loc=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.raftmodding.com%2Fforum%2Fviewtopic.php%3Ff%3D6%26t%3D32&v=1&out=https%3A%2F%2Fdrive.google.com%2Fuc%3Fexport%3Ddownload%26id%3D1Qc8Zqf0d27TJuyHyHebkFl1EThJH0glp&ref=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.raftmodding.com%2Fforum%2Fviewforum.php%3Ff%3D6&title=SimpleWeatherChange%20-%20Raft%20Modding%20Forum&txt=SimpleWeahterChange.dll%20V1.6)
## Changelog
###v1.1
 * changed the toggleWeather command into two commands to step forward and backwards
 * added an information in the console to which weather condition was switched
 * changed the way how the switching cycle works so it now starts at the current weather and not always from the first condition
### v1.2
 * updated so now all default weather conditions are available
### v1.3
 * changed the weather names to match those used from the game
### v1.4
 * added RML 3.0 support
### v1.5
 * added RML 4.0 support
### v1.6
 * added toggleWeatherCycle command
author: Tera
